schedule.comment: Time format: HH:MM (24-hour format). Leave empty to start immediately

tasks.prompt:
Models must be barefoot, with their legs and feet natural and without any adornment.
The swimsuit's top, bottoms, pose, facial expression, hairstyle, and makeup remain unchanged.

The model wears a white, cutout one-piece swimsuit made of matte white, high-stretch Lycra fabric with a tight, slightly sheen.

The top features triangular halter cups connected at the center front by two bronze metal beads, approximately 0.3 cm in diameter, forming a twisted chain link structure.
These beads connect the top and bottom sections, creating a vertical cutout.

The abdomen features a large crescent-shaped cutout that tapers at the sides to emphasize the waist.
The bottoms have a very high slit and a high-leg silhouette, with adjustable drawstrings at the sides.
The drawstrings end in bronze metal trim that matches the center bead.
This is a one-piece swimsuit, not a bikini.

Accessories: A layered chain necklace with a coin-shaped pendant complements the metallic finish of the swimsuit.
The necklace must remain completely separate and not be physically connected to any part of the swimsuit accessory to avoid confusion or misidentification during the build process.

comments.folder_structure: Each task folder should contain 'Source' and 'Generated_Output' subfolders
comments.reference_folder: Optional: Path to folder containing third set of images for 3-way comparison
comments.template_usage: use_comparison_template: true uses comparison_template_path (3 placeholders), false uses template_path (2 placeholders)
